item.description:
Well I know the real answer to that question..
Some are..and most are not...

Whats a BoneHead ?

Yeh you know...
and they go away or are eliminated..so says Deputy Dog.

But im talking another kind of BoneHead too.....

Ok for once in my life i will be a real "BoneHead"...Since i have only ever once been a BoneHead in my life, (and that was a few months ago) its time to be one again..and maybe one for a long time...

Is this criptic writing again...yep..

Its meant to filter out those who cant see the messages in betwen the lines and those who have no sence of humor at all..(I will give you an opportunity to get some humor in a moment)..
Most people like people that have fun, are creative, and can solve things for the betterment of themselves and others with minimal criticism, or can do it in a humorus way..thus the criptic nature of this event posting...

I dont want to be sitting near any permanent wimps or sour pusses...temporary ones..ok...This is your chance to HEAL.. or laugh like most of us... LOL

Here is the criptic subliminal message:

the ground looks wet outside..Hot sticky, damp, hard breathing..
Ok i will let the entertainer entertain you...Im getting the FunnyBoner T shirt... yep saving it for later use also on one of my FAVOURITES..LOL

This is an invitation to go to Rob's Wacky Wednesday for you enjoy...and for those wimpy sourpusses to see how a real comedian might enlighten them..(i think i do a good job at lightening them up so everyone can see them) ...before i be the Deputy Dog and..well..i wont say what im planning on doin.....LOL..

As the weather gets colder..more inside things will get planned ..
Rob's Wacky Wednesdays will be on listed his site...

OK DONT RSVP HERE>>>>
GO TO ROB'S FREE outdoor music meetup group.
http://livemusic.meet...

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Are You BoneHeads ????
